title: Gillian Anderson and Jeff Rovin: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Gillian Anderson talks about her first novel, A Vision of Fire, an epic sci-fi thriller she cowrote with bestselling writer Jeff Rovin.
